job.title: Sr. Staff Software Development Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompany ProfileltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLattice Semiconductor NASDAQ LSCC is the global leader in smart connectivity solutions providing market leading intellectual property and lowpower small formfactor devices that enable more than 8000 global customers to quickly deliver innovative and differentiated cost and power efficient productsltbrgtltbrgtThe Companys broad endmarket exposure solves customer problems across the network from the Edge to the Cloud for clients in consumer electronics industrial equipment communications infrastructure computing and automotive Our technology longstanding relationships and commitment to worldclass support enables our customers to quickly and easily unleash innovative solutions to create a smart secure and connected worldltbrgtltbrgtOur control connect and compute solutions enable the Internet of Things to operate safely easily and more autonomously at the edge of the network core While you may not see our products you are interacting with them all day every day We make your experience smarter and betterconnected Join Team Latticeand help us continue to drive innovation that creates a smarter betterconnected world Together we enable whats nextltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtA successful candidate will join a team designing and developing Lattice FPGA software tools at San JoseltligtltligtThe candidate will contribute to delivering software solutions for Lattice FPGA development with emphasis on advanced design flow developmentltligtltligtA strong communication skill is required because the candidate will need to cooperate with developers from different functional areas to build the flowltligtltligtThe candidate is expected to explore and develop advanced methodology in place and route to improve design performanceltligtltligtThe candidate will be responsible for maintaining existing software products and interacting with other teams to facilitate a valueadded solution ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtResponsible for advanced flowmethodology development QoR improvement and DiamondRadiant software releasesltligtltligt8 years experience in EDA backend development Expertise in C knowledge of data structure and graph algorithms and strong communication skills are required Experience in FPGA development is a plusltligtltligtMasters or PhD degree in EECECS or a related fieldltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtCompetitive Benefits Package IncludingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMedical dental vision effective on date of hireltligtltligt401k with company matchltligtltligtEmployee Stock Purchase plan Commuter Benefit and
